page.title: 18TREMATON VILLAGE
page.content: {Trematon village}is approx two and a half km from{Trematon Castle} and is situated in an isolated area. Trematon has few amenities. Farming is the only industry. The only{public {transport}is the bus and according to the local residents the service is very poor.Because of this most people travel by car. Many roads are no more than rough tracks. One of the main disadvantages of living here is the absence of a post office, the dependence on relatively expensive {mobile shops.}This causes difficulties for the disabled and elderly. There is an active{Women's Institute which meets in Trematon Hall,a private home,as there is no public meeting place in the village.{The Methodist {Church}was closed recently as the congregation had dwindled to two or three adults.
